content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study WI \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHELP/Instructions?preview=%2F378543447%2F700948783%2FEPM-HELP_WI+New+Profile+Creation+Procedure+Description.docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"New Profile Creation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn how New Profile Request is created in support.epam.com and which teams are responsible for which actions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Also pay attention that there is a special type of NPRs –NPRs for Remote (Anywhere/GDO) employees. In \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/UfElMQ\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"[Remote] NPR processing in support.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" you will learn how such requests are processed. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask your mentor to practice NPR requests of both types.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
